title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 99.8 - Use of brand names in advertisements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 99.8 - Use of brand names in advertisements

State Regulations

Nothing contained in this Part shall be deemed to
preclude any licensee from including in any advertisement the name or picture
of any product which is brand label registered pursuant to section
107-a
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control

Law and which is then being offered for sale by such
licensee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
99.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
